sources.name: Shipped

sources.name: Damage
sources.script:

		DamageType as string,

		ModelLine as string,
		Org_ID as string,
		Brand as string,
		RailHead as string,
		Truck_Key as string,
		HD_LOCATION as string,
		ORDER_TYPE as string,
		Customer as string,
		CUST_ID as string,

		Inv_LinkDate as string,
		ErrorCode as integer,
		ErrorColumn as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Damage
